original_text:
Therefore the abundance they have gained
    and what they have laid up
they carry away
    over the Brook of the Willows.
korean_text: 그러므로 그들이 얻은 재물과 쌓았던 것을 가지고 버드나무 시내를 건너리니

sentences.original_text: Therefore the abundance they have gained
and what they have laid up
over the Brook of the Willows.
